outline:
1. to leave, permit, forsake, cast off or away, reject, suffer, join, spread out or abroad, be loosed, cease, abandon, quit, hang loose, cast down, make a raid, lie fallow, let fall, forgo, draw
    1. (Qal)
      1. to leave, let alone, lie fallow, entrust to
      2. to forsake, abandon
      3. to permit
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be forsaken
      2. to be loosened, be loose
      3. to be let go, spread abroad
    3. (Pual) to be abandoned, be deserted
kjv_def: cast off, drawn, let fall, forsake, join (battle), leave (off), lie still, loose, spread (self) abroad, stretch out, suffer.
strongs_def: properly, to pound, i.e. smite; by implication (as if beating out, and thus expanding) to disperse; also, to thrust off, down, out or upon (inclusively, reject, let alone, permit, remit, etc.)
